item.title: Marie add a quote by Will Self
item.description: "The Ridyadh Bodkin and the Kuala Lumpur Mushroom are positive Meccas for all kinds of daredevils-of this much I'm sure. Decadent Saudi princes pilot microlights through huge holes in their facades, while Malaysian spider men scale them using giant suckers in lieu of crampons. All these activities serve to demonstrate is that modernist megaliths have completely suborned the role of natural features in providing us with the essential and vertiginous perspective we require to comprehend accurately our ant-like status." -- Will Self

item.title: Marie add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Something good will come of all things yet" -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Marie add a quote by J.J. Ratter
item.description: "These cultures come and go for a boundless enthusiasim for histories that might have never existed" -- J.J. Ratter

item.title: Marie add a quote by J.J. Ratter
item.description: "They document themselves in fear that they cannot exsist unless they are documented." -- J.J. Ratter

item.title: Marie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "We should take care not to make the intellect our god; it has, of course, powerful muscles, but no personality. " -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Marie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Marie add a quote by Henri Bergson
item.description: "The pure present is an ungraspable advance of the past devouring the future. In truth all sensation is already memory." -- Henri Bergson

item.title: Marie add a quote by James Agee
item.description: "In every child who is born, under no matter what circumstances, and no matter what parents, the potentiality of the human race is born again." -- James Agee
